nodes.text: Kanaver was one of the worlds once ruled by the Livien League, before being conquered by Xim the Despot in 25,130 BBY. Located within the Tion Hegemony, on the Outer Rim of the galaxy, it would later join the Galactic Republic, and eventually the Galactic Empire.
By the Post-Imperial Period, Kanaver had re-emerged as a prominent trading center near the Perlemian Trade Route, the Back Spiral worlds and the Overic Griplink.
